examples.text: aún está de buen ver

translations.text: he still looks good
he's still good-looking / attractive

examples.text: no es de mal ver

translations.text: she's not bad-looking

examples.text: a mi/su ver

translations.text: as I see/he sees it
in my/his view

examples.text: los vieron salir por la puerta trasera

translations.text: they were seen leaving by the back door

examples.text: ¿ves el letrero allí enfrente?

translations.text: can / do you see that sign opposite?

examples.text: van a bajar los impuestos — ¡y tú que lo veas!

translations.text: they're going to cut taxes — do you think you'll live long enough to see it?

examples.text: aquí donde me ves, tengo 90 años cumplidos

translations.text: believe it or not, I'm ninety years old

examples.text: me acuerdo perfectamente, es como si lo estuviera viendo

translations.text: I remember it perfectly, as if I were seeing it now

examples.text: el fracaso se veía venir

translations.text: it was obvious / you could see it was going to fail

examples.text: en cuanto le pedí un favor, si te he visto no me acuerdo

translations.text: as soon as I asked a favor of him, he just didn't want to know

examples.text: ver venir algo/a algn
lo vi con mis propios ojos

translations.text: I saw it with my own two eyes / with my (very) own eyes
I saw it with my own eyes
I saw it myself / with my own two eyes

examples.text: ahí donde la ves tiene un genio …

translations.text: incredible though it may seem, she has a real temper …

examples.text: ya lo veo venir, seguro que quiere una semana libre

translations.text: I know what he's after, I bet he wants a week off

examples.text: la vi bailar en Londres hace años

translations.text: I saw her dance in London years ago

examples.text: lo vi hablando con ella

translations.text: I saw him talking to her

examples.text: ¿ves algo?

translations.text: can you see anything?

examples.text: no ver ni tres en un burro / ni un burro a tres pasos / ni jota
te veía venir, ya sabía lo que me ibas a pedir

translations.text: I thought as much, I knew what you were going to ask me for

examples.text: la vi metérselo en el bolsillo

translations.text: I saw her put it into her pocket

examples.text: ¡que cumplas muchos más! — ¡y tú que lo veas!

translations.text: many happy returns! — thank you very much

examples.text: enciende la luz que no se ve nada

translations.text: switch on the light, I can't see a thing

examples.text: si te he visto no me acuerdo
ver algo/a algn + inf/ger
¡y tú que lo veas!
se te ve la combinación

translations.text: your slip is showing

examples.text: sin gafas no veo ni jota

translations.text: I can't see a thing without my glasses
without my glasses I'm as blind as a bat

examples.text: tú ves visiones, allí no hay nada

translations.text: you're seeing things, there's nothing there

examples.text: ahí donde lo/la ves

translations.text: to see

examples.text: no poder (ni) ver a algn
un espectáculo que hay que ver

translations.text: a show which you must see / which is not to be missed
a show which is a must

examples.text: esa película ya la he visto

translations.text: I've seen that movie before

examples.text: no lo puedo ver ni pintado / ni en pintura

translations.text: I can't stand the sight of him

examples.text: ¿te has hecho daño?, déjame ver

translations.text: have you hurt yourself? let me see

examples.text: no puede ni verla / no la puede ver

translations.text: he can't stand her
he can't stand the sight of her

examples.text: estaba viendo la televisión

translations.text: I was watching television
to watch

examples.text: ya la veo tumbada en la arena sin hacer nada …

translations.text: I can see / picture her now lying on the sand doing nothing …

examples.text: yo no la veo viviendo en el campo

translations.text: I can't see / imagine / picture her living in the country
to see
to imagine
to picture

examples.text: la veo muy contenta

translations.text: she looks / seems very happy

examples.text: es un poco complicado, ¿sabes? — ya se ve

translations.text: it's a bit complicated, you know — so I (can) see

examples.text: ¿ves qué amargo es?

translations.text: you see how bitter it is?

examples.text: te veo preocupado ¿qué te pasa?

translations.text: you look worried, what's the matter?

examples.text: se te ve en la cara

translations.text: I can tell by your face

examples.text: ya veo/ya se ve que no tienes mucha práctica en esto

translations.text: you obviously haven't had much practice at this
I can see / it's obvious you haven't had much practice at this

examples.text: solo ve sus problemas

translations.text: he's only interested in his own problems

examples.text: hacerse ver

translations.text: to show off

examples.text: ¿no ves que la situación es grave?

translations.text: don't / can't you see how serious the situation is?

examples.text: se le ve que disfruta con su trabajo

translations.text: you can see / tell she enjoys her work

examples.text: no quiere ver la realidad

translations.text: he won't face up to reality
to see

examples.text: se echa de ver que está muy contento

translations.text: it's obvious he's very happy

examples.text: pronto echó de ver que le faltaba dinero

translations.text: he soon realized / noticed that some of his money was missing

examples.text: echar de ver

translations.text: to notice
to realize

examples.text: ¡ya verás lo que es bueno si no me haces caso!

translations.text: you'll see what you get if you don't do as I say

examples.text: ¡eso está por ver!

translations.text: we'll see about that!

examples.text: gané por tres sets a cero ¡para que veas!

translations.text: I won by three sets to love, so there!

examples.text: ve a ver quién es

translations.text: go and see who it is

examples.text: verás como no viene

translations.text: he won't come, wait and see / you'll see

examples.text: ¡eso ya se verá!

translations.text: we'll see

examples.text: ya no funciona ¿lo ves? / ¿viste? te dije que no lo tocaras

translations.text: now, it's not working any more. You see? I told you not to touch it

examples.text: ¡para que veas! ¡tú que decías que no iba a ser capaz!

translations.text: see? I did it! and you said I wouldn't be able to!

examples.text: habrá que ver si cumple su promesa

translations.text: it remains to be seen / we'll have to see whether he keeps his promise
to see

examples.text: ¡habráse visto semejante desfachatez!

translations.text: what a nerve!

examples.text: que no veas
¡hombre! ¿tú por aquí? — ya ves, no tenía otra cosa que hacer

translations.text: hello, what are you doing here? — well, I didn't have anything else to do

examples.text: tenías que haber visto lo furioso que se puso

translations.text: you should have seen how angry he got

examples.text: que no veo
hay que ver qué bien se portaron

translations.text: it's amazing how well they behaved
they behaved really well

examples.text: me echó una bronca que no veas

translations.text: she gave me such an earful!
you wouldn't believe the earful she gave me!

examples.text: tengo un sueño que no veo

translations.text: I'm so tired I can hardly keep my eyes open

examples.text: hay que ver lo grosera que es

translations.text: she's incredibly rude

examples.text: ¡nunca he visto cosa igual!

translations.text: I've never seen anything like it!

examples.text: ¡vieras / hubieras visto cómo se asustaron …!

translations.text: you should have seen the fright they got!

examples.text: pensaba tomarme el día libre pero ya ves, aquí me tienes

translations.text: I intended taking the day off but … well, here I am

examples.text: tienen una cocina que no veas

translations.text: they have an incredible kitchen

examples.text: ¡hay que ver lo que ha crecido!

translations.text: wow / gosh! hasn't he grown!

examples.text: tengo un hambre que no veo

translations.text: I'm absolutely starving
I'm so hungry I could eat a horse

examples.text: vieron confirmadas sus sospechas

translations.text: their suspicions were confirmed
they saw their suspicions confirmed

examples.text: ¡si vieras lo mal que lo pasé!

translations.text: you can't imagine how awful it was!

examples.text: tenía una borrachera que no veas

translations.text: he was absolutely blind drunk

examples.text: es tan bonita, si vieras …

translations.text: she's so pretty, you should see her

examples.text: ¡hay que ver! hasta se llevaron el dinero de los niños

translations.text: would you believe it! they even took the children's money

examples.text: ¡hay que ver! ¡lo que son las cosas!

translations.text: well, well, well! / I don't know! would you believe it?
to see

examples.text: a ver cuándo vienes a visitarnos

translations.text: come and see us soon/one of these days

examples.text: a ver
a ver si me entienden

translations.text: let me make myself clear
don't get me wrong

examples.text: aquí está en el periódico — ¿a ver?

translations.text: it's here in the newspaper — let's see

examples.text: ¡a ver si ahora se cree que se lo robé yo!

translations.text: I hope he doesn't think that I stole it!

examples.text: aprieta el botón a ver qué pasa

translations.text: press the button and let's see what happens

examples.text: ¡a ver!

translations.text: hello?

examples.text: a ver si arreglas esa lámpara

translations.text: when are you going to fix that light?

examples.text: ¡cállate, a ver si alguien te oye!

translations.text: shut up, somebody might hear you

examples.text: a ver, el fórceps, rápido

translations.text: give me the forceps, quickly

examples.text: ¿a ver qué tienes ahí?

translations.text: let me see / show me what you've got there
what have you got there?

examples.text: a ver si escribes pronto

translations.text: make sure you write soon
write soon

examples.text: (vamos) a ver ¿de qué se trata?

translations.text: OK / all right / well, now, what's the problem?

examples.text: aún no lo sé, ya veré qué hago

translations.text: I still don't know, I'll decide what to do later

examples.text: esto mejor que lo veas tú

translations.text: you'd better look at this / see this / have a look at this

examples.text: no vimos ese tema en clase

translations.text: we didn't look at / study / do that topic in class

examples.text: tengo que ver cómo lo arreglo

translations.text: I have to work out / see how I can fix it

examples.text: véase el capítulo anterior

translations.text: see (the) previous chapter

examples.text: ¿la ha visto ya un médico?

translations.text: has she been seen by a doctor yet?
has she seen a doctor yet?

examples.text: ¿por qué no te haces ver por un especialista?

translations.text: why don't you see a specialist?
to try
to hear

examples.text: a mi modo / manera de ver

translations.text: to my way of thinking
the way I see it

examples.text: cada uno ve las cosas a su manera

translations.text: everybody sees things differently
everybody has their own point of view

examples.text: yo eso no lo veo bien

translations.text: I don't think that's right

examples.text: no le veo la gracia

translations.text: I don't think it's funny
I don't find it funny

examples.text: no veo por qué no

translations.text: I don't see why not

examples.text: ¿tú le ves algún inconveniente?

translations.text: can you see any drawbacks to it?

examples.text: no le veo nada de malo

translations.text: I can't see anything wrong in it

examples.text: no le veo salida a esta situación

translations.text: I can't see any way out of this situation
to see

examples.text: ahora que vive lejos lo vemos menos

translations.text: we don't see so much of him now that he lives so far away

examples.text: aún no he ido a ver a la abuela

translations.text: I still haven't been to see / visit grandmother

examples.text: ¡cuánto tiempo sin verte!

translations.text: I haven't seen you for ages / it's been ages since I last saw you
I haven't seen you for ages!
long time, no see
long time, no see!

examples.text: hace tiempo que no lo veo

translations.text: I haven't seen him for some time

examples.text: es mejor que vea a su propio médico

translations.text: it's better if you go to / see your own doctor

examples.text: las veo

translations.text: I'll see you

examples.text: eso no tiene nada que ver con lo que estamos discutiendo

translations.text: that has nothing to do with what we are discussing

examples.text: ¿tuviste algo que ver en ese asunto?

translations.text: did you have anything to do with / any connection with that business?
were you involved in that business?

examples.text: ¿tendrán algo que ver con los Icasuriaga de Zamora?

translations.text: are they related in any way to the Icasuriagas from Zamora?

examples.text: es muy joven — ¿y eso qué tiene que ver?

translations.text: he's very young — and what does that have to do with it?

examples.text: no tengo nada que ver con esa compañía

translations.text: I have no connection with that company
I have nothing to do with that company

examples.text: ¿qué tiene que ver que sea sábado?

translations.text: what difference does it make that it's Saturday?

examples.text: tener … que ver
enciende la luz que no veo

translations.text: turn on the light, I can't see

examples.text: no veo bien de lejos/de cerca

translations.text: I'm nearsighted/farsighted
to see

examples.text: pues verás, la cosa empezó cuando …

translations.text: well you see, the whole thing began when …

examples.text: ver para creer

translations.text: seeing is believing

examples.text: ¿hay cerveza? — no sé, voy a ver

translations.text: is there any beer? — I don't know, I'll have a look

examples.text: verás, no quería engañarte pero …

translations.text: look, I wasn't trying to deceive you, it's just that …

examples.text: ¿está Juan? — voy a ver

translations.text: is Juan in? — I'll go and see

examples.text: seguimos en veremos

translations.text: we still don't know anything
we're still in the dark

examples.text: vamos a ver or veamos, ¿dónde le duele?

translations.text: let's see now, where does it hurt?

examples.text: estar/seguir en veremos
¿vas a decir que sí? — ya veré, déjame pensarlo un poco

translations.text: are you going to accept? I'll see, let me think about it

examples.text: todavía está en veremos

translations.text: it isn't certain yet
to see

examples.text: a ver
ver de

translations.text: to try

examples.text: vean de que no se dé cuenta

translations.text: try to make sure he doesn't notice

examples.text: vamos a ver de hacerlo lo más rápido posible

translations.text: let's try to get it done / let's see if we can get it done as quickly as possible

examples.text: se vio reflejado en el agua

translations.text: he saw his reflection in the water

examples.text: ¿te quieres ver en el espejo?

translations.text: do you want to see yourself / look at yourself in the mirror?
to see oneself

examples.text: ¿tú te ves viviendo allí?

translations.text: can you see yourself living there?
to see oneself

examples.text: vérselas y deseárselas

translations.text: to have a hard time (of it)

examples.text: me vi obligado a despedirlo

translations.text: I was obliged to dismiss him
I had no choice but to dismiss him

examples.text: verse venir algo

translations.text: to see sth coming

examples.text: me las vi y me las deseé estudiando y trabajando durante cinco años

translations.text: it was really tough / hard / it was a real struggle studying and working for five years

examples.text: me las veía venir por eso tomé precauciones

translations.text: I saw it coming so I took precautions

examples.text: se vio en la necesidad de pedir dinero prestado

translations.text: he found himself having to borrow money

examples.text: me vi en un aprieto

translations.text: I found myself in a tight spot

examples.text: vérselas venir

translations.text: to find oneself

examples.text: las cifras se ven aumentadas al final del verano

translations.text: the figures rise at the end of the summer

examples.text: este problema se ha visto agravado por …

translations.text: this problem has been made worse by …

examples.text: el país se verá beneficiado con este acuerdo

translations.text: the country will benefit from this agreement

examples.text: me veo gordísima con esta falda

translations.text: I look really fat in this skirt
to look

examples.text: se veían un par de veces al mes

translations.text: they used to see each other / meet a couple of times a month

examples.text: ya no me veo con ellos

translations.text: I don't see them any more

examples.text: verse con algn

translations.text: to see sb

examples.text: tendrá que vérselas conmigo como se atreva a molestarte

translations.text: he'll have me to deal with if he dares to bother you

examples.text: vérselas con algn
¡nos vemos!

translations.text: I'll be seeing you!
see you!

examples.text: nos vemos a las siete

translations.text: I'll meet / see you at seven

examples.text: es mejor que no nos veamos durante un tiempo

translations.text: we'd better not see each other for a while
to meet
